name: your-spotify
description: your_spotify is a self-hosted dashboard and statistics platform for Spotify accounts. It imports listening history, visualizes top tracks and artists, and offers insights into listening habits over time.

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Import and store your complete Spotify listening history with timestamps and track details

features.title: Top Tracks Analysis
features.description: Discover your most-played songs across different time periods with play count rankings

features.title: Artist Statistics
features.description: View your favorite artists with listening time, track counts, and discovery timelines

features.title: Genre Breakdown
features.description: Analyze your music taste by genre with visual charts showing distribution and trends

features.title: Temporal Insights
features.description: See when you listen most with hourly, daily, and monthly activity heatmaps

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Understand playlist composition with statistics on duration, diversity, and listening patterns

features.title: Comparison Tools
features.description: Compare listening habits across different time periods to track evolving music preferences

features.title: Album Tracking
features.description: Monitor complete album plays and discover your most-listened albums over time
